+++
title = "HackerRank - 101 Hack 51 -  Fair Cake Cutting "
slug = "2017-08-08-hackerrank-101-hack-51-fair-cake-cutting"
published = 2017-08-08T00:25:00.001000+05:30
author = "Krishankant Ray"
tags = []
+++
<span style="color: red;">**<span
style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">Problem: Fair
Cake Cutting</span>**</span>  
  
Leha is a young man from Belarus. He loves cakes really much. In Leha's
country, cakes are always evenly divided between people.  
Leha wants to know how many people he should invite to his party if he
has a cake whose size is equal to <span id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame"
class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
units and he wants each person to get *exactly* <span
id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
units of cake. Note that Leha doesn't take a piece for himself; in other
words, the cake is only divided among the people he invited to the
party.  
  
  

<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">**<span
style="color: red;">Input Format</span>**</span>

The first line contains three space-separated integers describing the
respective values of <span id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame"
class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
<span id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
and <span id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.

  
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">**<span
style="color: red;">Constraints</span>**</span>

  

-   <span id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
-   <span id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
    style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
-   It is guaranteed that the answer is an integer.

  
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">**<span
style="color: red;">Output Format</span>**</span>

  
Print a single integer denoting <span id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame"
class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
the number of people he should invite to his party.

  
  
<span style="color: cyan;">Sample Input 0</span>

     

    5 10 1

  
<span style="color: cyan;">Sample Output 0</span>

     

    2

  
<span style="color: red;">**<span
style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">**Explanation**
0</span>**</span>

In this sample case, <span id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame"
class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>,
<span id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
and <span id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>.
Leha wants each person to get <span id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame"
class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
units of cake. He has a cake whose size is <span
id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
unit, so if he invites <span id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame"
class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
people and the cake is distributed evenly among them, each person gets
<span id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
units of cake. Therefore, the answer is b=2 .  
  
<span style="color: red;">**<span
style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">Solutions :
</span>**</span>  
  

    #include <cmath>
    #include <cstdio>
    #include <vector>
    #include <iostream>
    #include <algorithm>
    using namespace std;


    int main() {
        unsigned long int A,B,a,x;
        double p;
        cin>>A>>B>>a;
     p=((B*a)/A);
        
        x= floor(p);
        cout<<x;
        return 0;
    }

<span id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyBoZWlnaHQ9IjIuMTc2ZXgiIHN0eWxlPSJ2ZXJ0aWNhbC1hbGlnbjogLTAuMzM4ZXg7IiB2aWV3Ym94PSIwIC03OTEuMyAyMjY0LjEgOTM2LjkiIHdpZHRoPSI1LjI1OGV4Ij48ZyBmaWxsPSJjdXJyZW50Q29sb3IiIHN0cm9rZT0iY3VycmVudENvbG9yIiBzdHJva2Utd2lkdGg9IjAiIHRyYW5zZm9ybT0ibWF0cml4KDEgMCAwIC0xIDAgMCkiPjwvZz48L3N2Zz4=)</span>

<span id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" class="MathJax_SVG"
style="display: inline-block; font-size: 100%;">![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)</span>
